title: Statue

properties.name: description
properties.value: Statue may refer to a number of topics:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Statue
 This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
Reason: There are more statues in Gielinor
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.

Statue may refer to a number of topics:

Contents

  • 1 Construction
  • 2 Altars
  • 3 Quest Related
  • 4 Minigame Related
  • 5 Miscellaneous
  • 6 See also

Construction[edit | edit source]

  • Large statue
  • Small statue
  • Imp statue
  • Statue space
  • Medium statue

Altars[edit | edit source]

  • Tribal Statue, found in Tai Bwo Wannai.
  • The Statue located in the upper tier of Darkmeyer.
  • The statues of Saradomin, Zamorak and Guthix in the Mage Arena bank area.
  • The Gorilla Statue dedicated to Marimbo on Ape Atoll.

Quest Related[edit | edit source]

  • Mysterious statue, part of the Holy Grail quest.
  • Getting the statues, relating to the statues within the Garden of Tranquility.
  • Golden goblin, a statue of Gubblebak during the Grim Tales quest.
  • The statue of King Rada I, in the centre of the Great Kourend, that the player must help to rebuild during the Architectural Alliance miniquest.
  • The Statue to be built during Enakhra's Lament, or its headless or fallen variants.
  • Saradomin statue, the entrance to the Tunnel of Chaos, for the What Lies Below quest.
  • Vampyre statue, used in the Darkness of Hallowvale quest.
  • The statue of Glough used in Monkey Madness II to obtain the Book of spyology.
  • The statue of Baxtorian encountered during Song of the Elves, next to the statue of Glarial.
  • The statue of Lady Ithell in Lletya built during Song of the Elves.
  • The statues in the "Lady Table" part of the Recruitment Drive quest.
  • The statue of Saradomin encountered during The Great Brain Robbery.
  • The statue used during King's Ransom to enter Camelot.
  • The Gorilla statue used to reach Bonzara during Monkey Madness I
  • The statues depicting the five houses of Great Kourend, used during A Kingdom Divided.

Minigame Related[edit | edit source]

  • Guardian (Chambers of Xeric), two statues fought in the Chambers of Xeric.
  • Several statues in the Hallowed Sepulchre:
    • Knight Statue
    • Wizard Statue
    • Crossbowman Statue
    • Priest Statue
    • Broken Statue near the entrance of the minigame.
  • Guardian statue, previously used within the Mage Training Arena to move the Maze guardian around.
  • Champion Statue in the Champions' Guild, entrance to the Champions' Challenge.
  • Several statues in the Mage Training Arena.
  • Statues of the monsters in Barbarian assault.
  • Heroic statues in the Last Man Standing arena.

Miscellaneous[edit | edit source]

  • Several statues in Keldagrim:
    • Alvis's Statue, dedicated to King Alvis.
    • Almost a Statue
    • Statue (Unfinished)
    • Statue (Keldagrim)
    • Statue (Entrance to Keldagrim)
  • Old Memorial, statue of King Kharedst IV.
  • Zamorak's Statue in Slepe.
  • Statues of gnomes:
    • Hazelmere statue
    • Oaknock statue
    • Healthorg statue
  • Mythic Statue in Myths' Guild, entrance to Corsair Cove Dungeon.
  • TzHaar statue in Mor Ul Rek.
  • Dragon statue on Crandor and above the Shayzien crypts.
  • Monkey Statues on Ape Atoll.
  • The statues on top of Mount Quidamortem.
  • The statues where the Slug Prince is fought in the Witchaven Dungeon.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Statuette, a word for a small statue.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

{{External|rs}}
{{Incomplete|There are more statues in Gielinor}}
'''Statue''' may refer to a number of topics:

===Construction===
* [[Large statue]]
* [[Small statue]]
* [[Imp statue]]
* [[Statue space]]
* [[Medium statue]]

===Altars===
* [[Tribal Statue]], found in [[Tai Bwo Wannai]].
* The [[Statue (Darkmeyer)|Statue]] located in the upper tier of [[Darkmeyer]]. 
* The [[Statue (Mage Arena)|statues]] of [[Saradomin]], [[Zamorak]] and [[Guthix]] in the [[Mage Arena]] bank area.
* The [[Gorilla Statue]] dedicated to [[Marimbo]] on [[Ape Atoll]].

===Quest Related===
* [[Mysterious statue]], part of the [[Holy Grail]] quest.
* [[Garden_of_Tranquillity#Getting_the_statues|Getting the statues]], relating to the statues within the [[Garden of Tranquility]].
* [[Golden goblin]], a statue of [[Gubblebak]] during the [[Grim Tales]] quest.
* The [[statue (King Rada I)|statue]] of [[King Rada I]], in the centre of the [[Great Kourend]], that the player must help to rebuild during the [[Architectural Alliance]] miniquest.
* The [[Statue (Enakhra's Lament)|Statue]] to be built during [[Enakhra's Lament]], or its [[Headless statue|headless]] or [[Fallen statue|fallen]] variants.
* Saradomin [[Statue (Tunnel of Chaos)|statue]], the entrance to the [[Tunnel of Chaos]], for the [[What Lies Below]] quest.
* [[Vampyre statue]], used in the [[Darkness of Hallowvale]] quest.
* The [[Gnome statue (Monkey Madness II)|statue of Glough]] used in [[Monkey Madness II]] to obtain the [[Book of spyology]].
* The [[Statue of Baxtorian|statue]] of [[Baxtorian]] encountered during [[Song of the Elves]], next to the [[statue of Glarial]].
* The [[Well (Lletya)#Statue|statue]] of [[Lady Ithell (Fourth Age)|Lady Ithell]] in [[Lletya]] built during [[Song of the Elves]].
* The [[Statue (Recruitment Drive)|statues]] in the "[[Recruitment Drive#Lady Table|Lady Table]]" part of the [[Recruitment Drive]] quest.
* The [[Statue (The Great Brain Robbery)|statue]] of [[Saradomin]] encountered during [[The Great Brain Robbery]].
* The [[Statue (King's Ransom)|statue]] used during [[King's Ransom]] to enter [[Camelot]].
* The [[Gorilla Statue (Monkey Madness I)|Gorilla statue]] used to reach [[Bonzara]] during [[Monkey Madness I]]
* The [[Statue (Great Kourend)|statues]] depicting the five houses of [[Great Kourend]], used during [[A Kingdom Divided]].

===Minigame Related===
* [[Guardian (Chambers of Xeric)]], two statues fought in the [[Chambers of Xeric]].
* Several statues in the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]:
** [[Knight Statue]]
** [[Wizard Statue]]
** [[Crossbowman Statue]]
** [[Priest Statue]]
** [[Broken Statue]] near the entrance of the minigame.
* [[Guardian statue]], previously used within the [[Mage Training Arena]] to move the [[Maze guardian]] around.
* [[Champion Statue]] in the [[Champions' Guild]], entrance to the [[Champions' Challenge]].
* Several [[statue (Mage Training Arena)|statues]] in the [[Mage Training Arena]].
* [[Statue (Barbarian assault)|Statues]] of the monsters in [[Barbarian assault]].
* [[Heroic statue]]s in the [[Last Man Standing]] arena.

===Miscellaneous===
* Several statues in [[Keldagrim]]:
** [[Giant Dwarf (statue)#King Alvis|Alvis's Statue]], dedicated to [[King Alvis]].
** [[Almost a Statue]]
** [[Statue (Unfinished)]]
** [[Statue (Keldagrim)]]
** [[Statue (Entrance to Keldagrim)]]
* [[Old Memorial]], statue of [[King Kharedst IV]].
* [[Zamorak's Statue]] in [[Slepe]].
* Statues of gnomes:
** [[Hazelmere statue]]
** [[Oaknock statue]]
** [[Healthorg statue]]
* [[Mythic Statue]] in [[Myths' Guild]], entrance to [[Corsair Cove Dungeon]].
* [[TzHaar statue]] in [[Mor Ul Rek]].
* [[Dragon statue]] on [[Crandor]] and above the [[Shayzien crypts]].
* [[Monkey Statue]]s on [[Ape Atoll]].
* The [[Statue (Mount Quidamortem)|statues]] on top of [[Mount Quidamortem]].
* The [[Statue (Witchaven Dungeon)|statues]] where the [[Slug Prince]] is fought in the [[Witchaven Dungeon]].

==See also==
* [[Statuette]], a word for a small statue.
{{disambig}}
